title: â€‹M- Ticket For Movies : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
What is an M-Ticket?
Once your booking is confirmed, you'll receive a link along with the confirmation SMS/WhatsApp.
Click on it, download the M-Ticket on your mobile or present the 'Your Order's section, no printout needed.
Scan the QR code at the cinema entrance and enjoy the show!
Note: If you're booking as a Guest, you'll receive the option to select M ticket. And if you're a registered user then we recommended to save the changes as M'ticket under 'Accounts & Settings'
